column4: help!  I've reset my iphone (all content and settings) and now my phone is stuck in a loop with the apple logo.  I have no backup in itunes.  I want to get back to a factory settings iOS, how can I do this.  I can't seem to get the device into DFU mode.  Despair is imminent!
How is this even slightly Ubuntu related?
its xchat switching to ubuntu chan by default even though I opened another chan just before
